=head1 NAME

DiaColloDB::methods::export - import/export methods for DiaColloDB

=cut

##========================================================================
## SYNOPSIS
=pod

=head1 SYNOPSIS

 ##========================================================================
 ## PRELIMINARIES
 
 use DiaColloDB;
 $coldb = DiaColloDB->new(%args);
 
 ##========================================================================
 ## Export/Import
 
 $bool = $coldb->dbexport();
 $coldb = $coldb->dbimport();
 

=cut

##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

The C<DiaColloDB::methods::export> module adds import and export
methods for the top-level L<DiaColloDB|DiaColloDB> package,
which see for more details.

Prior to v2.12.012, the methods defined by this module
were defined directly in the top-level C<DiaColloDB> package.

=cut

##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB: Export/Import
=pod

=head2 Export/Import

=over 4

=item dbexport

 $bool = $coldb->dbexport();
 $bool = $coldb->dbexport($outdir,%opts);

$outdir defaults to "$coldb-E<gt>{dbdir}/export"
%opts:

 export_sdat => $bool,  ##-- whether to export *.sdat (stringified tuple files for debugging; default=0)
 export_cof  => $bool,  ##-- do/don't export cof.* (default=do)

=item dbimport

 $coldb = $coldb->dbimport();
 $coldb = $coldb->dbimport($txtdir,%opts)

Import ColocDB data from $txtdir

B<TODO>

=back

=cut
